name: Bound To The Beat
description:
Click the Arrow Key or WASD when the colored arrow reaches the top arrow to rap. Compete in rap battles against demons and angels to escape from hell. Mix the A parts and B parts of songs for a wide variety of possibilities. With two rhythms bound together experience hellish difficulty.

Sorry about the web game running a bit slow, I recommend downloading for a better playing experience. I am not able to test Mac and Linux so let me know if those builds don't work.

Credits:

Abigail Hill: Art

Matteo Vera: Design, Music, Programming

Made for the 2021 GMTK game jam
